projects.name: Executive Insights Dashboard
projects.description: A comprehensive executive dashboard providing real-time KPIs, revenue metrics, and strategic insights. Features interactive visualizations for CFO-level decision making, including financial performance tracking, trend analysis, and key business metrics across multiple dimensions.

projects.name: Sales Performance Analytics
projects.description: Advanced sales analytics dashboard featuring revenue breakdowns, customer segmentation, and performance metrics. Includes trend analysis, forecasting capabilities, and detailed drill-down views for sales team performance, product categories, and regional comparisons.

projects.name: Marketing & Operations Dashboard
projects.description: Integrated marketing and operations intelligence platform delivering actionable insights on campaign performance, operational efficiency, and resource allocation. Features multi-channel analytics, conversion tracking, and operational KPIs with predictive modeling capabilities.

projects.name: Web Analytics Intelligence Platform
projects.description: Sophisticated web analytics dashboard providing comprehensive insights into user behavior, traffic patterns, and engagement metrics. Features real-time monitoring, conversion funnel analysis, audience segmentation, and detailed performance tracking across all digital touchpoints.

projects.name: Yadree: Business Intelligence Consultant System
projects.description: A comprehensive AI-powered business intelligence solution that integrates real-time data visualization, SQLFlow, and machine learning to enhance decision-making. Features automated insights generation, natural language querying, and intelligent data exploration capabilities.

projects.name: KPI on the Fly AI
projects.description: A powerful AI-powered business intelligence platform designed to generate real-time KPIs directly from your data. Seamlessly integrating with Apache Superset, it enables effortless dashboard creation and dynamic KPI generation. Experience streamlined analytics with intelligent automation and Excel integration.
